content.text: Match ends, Mallorca 1, Las Palmas 1.
Second Half ends, Mallorca 1, Las Palmas 1.

Alexandre Coeff (Mallorca) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Abdón Prats (Mallorca) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.
Substitution, Mallorca. Gai Assulin replaces Fofo.
Attempt missed. Aythami Artiles (Las Palmas) header from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Juan Carlos Valerón with a cross following a set piece situation.

Substitution, Mallorca. Alexandre Coeff replaces Biel Company.

Goal!  Mallorca 1, Las Palmas 1. Martí (Mallorca) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner following a corner.
